title: Kylie Jenner's surprisingly normal name choice for 'second child' after Stormi
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Despite her split from Travis Scott, Kylie Jenner has made it clear she wants to have more children.

She'd always wanted to be a young mum and to have a big family.

And after welcoming daughter Stormi with rapper Travis last year, she's hoping to add to her brood one day.

Even though she and Travis are over, Kylie answered a question from a fan which could reveal a huge clue about the names of her future children.

The 22-year-old was asked: "What are other names you considered naming Stormi?"

Kylie answered: "Rose i still love that name.."

Her answer seemed to suggest she could end up using the name if she has another daughter.

(Image: WireImage)

(Image: Instagram)

And after taking to motherhood like a duck to water, fans will be hoping to see her welcome another child one day.

Kylie and Travis have both spoken out since their split to deny cheating on each other.

Kylie took to Twitter to blast rumours she'd met up with ex Tyga for a secret late-night date.

She said: "The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is.

(Image: DPA/PA Images)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

"There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.

"Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi. Our friendship and our daughter is priority."

Then after being linked to an Instagram model named YungSweetRo, Travis spoke out to deny being unfaithful as well.

He said: "It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true.

(Image: Kylie Jenner/Instagram)

"Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real."

It's since been reported that Kylie and Travis are simply taking a break.

A source told People: "They are taking some time but not done. They still have some trust issues but their problems have stemmed more from the stress of their lifestyles."

description: The make-up mogul may have split from boyfriend Travis Scott, but she already has a name picked out for her second child
